name: Ruzka
descriptions: Ruzka is a unique ghoulified yao guai, living in the far northwest corner of Point Lookout in the Fallout 3 add-on Point Lookout. Ruzka is, in fact, the only yao guai found in the add-on, in a small alcove at the end of a small inlet channel, nearby the jet crash site and the sacred bog.
Ruzka the Wonder Bear was the former star attraction of Point Lookout, known for her ball dancing abilities.
Herbert Dashwood is convinced that wastelanders are "not going to find one of these babies balancing on a big rubber ball," indicating he never met Ruzka.
Ruzka appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Point Lookout.
PC Playstation 3 Xbox 360 Ruzka may spawn in the wrong place, inside an object, or not at all.
